input.label: Select The Time Range to Search

search.query: | tstats count where index=* by index | sort index
|tstats count where index=* by sourcetype | sort sourcetype
|makeresults | eval Action = "Click to Use These Settings in Production" | table Action

($indexes$) ($sourcetypes$) ()| head $records$ | eval sourcetype = if(index="pii", sourcetype + ":pii",sourcetype) | $features$ | fields _raw sourcetype _time address adjective adverb first_name noun preposition pronoun surname verb term two_digit three_digit four_digit five_digit six_digit seven_digit eight_digit hyphenated underscored dotted spaced | eval terms = mvcount(term) | eval hyphenated = replace(hyphenated,"\d","X") | eval underscored = replace(underscored,"\d","X") | eval dotted = replace(dotted,"\d","X") | eval spaced = replace(spaced,"\d","X") | foreach * [eval <<FIELD>>s = mvcount(<<FIELD>>)] | foreach * [eval 1st_<<FIELD>> = mvindex(<<FIELD>>,1) , 2nd_<<FIELD>> = mvindex(<<FIELD>>,2) , 3rd_<<FIELD>> = mvindex(<<FIELD>>,3), 4th_<<FIELD>> = mvindex(<<FIELD>>,4), 5th_<<FIELD>> = mvindex(<<FIELD>>,5)] | fields - _raw _time | fields - address adjective adverb first_name noun preposition pronoun surname verb term *digit | fillnull

| sample ratio=0.7 $features_extracted$ | fit LogisticRegression fit_intercept=true "sourcetype" from "hyphenated" "underscored" "dotted" "spaced" "1st_address" "1st_adjective" "1st_adverb" "1st_noun" "1st_preposition" "1st_term" "1st_verb" "2nd_adjective" "2nd_noun" "2nd_term" "2nd_verb" "3rd_adjective" "3rd_noun" "3rd_term" "3rd_verb" "4th_adjective" "4th_noun" "4th_term" "4th_verb" "5th_adjective" "5th_noun" "5th_term" "5th_verb" "addresss" "adjectives" "adverbs" "dotteds" "eight_digits" "five_digits" "four_digits" "nouns" "prepositions" "six_digits" "sourcetypes" "terms" "termss" "three_digits" "two_digits" "verbs" into "$model_name$"

| sample ratio=0.3 $fitted$ | apply "$model_name$" | multireport [ score precision_recall_fscore_support "sourcetype" against "predicted(sourcetype)" average=weighted | rename fbeta_score as f1 | fields f1 precision recall | foreach * [ eval <<FIELD>> = round(<<FIELD>>, 2)]] [ score accuracy_score "sourcetype" against "predicted(sourcetype)" | eval accuracy = round(accuracy_score, 2)] | table accuracy f1 precision recall | stats first(*) as *

| sample ratio=0.3 $fitted$ | apply "$model_name$" | `confusionmatrix("sourcetype","predicted(sourcetype)")` | addtotals | foreach Predicted* [ eval <<FIELD>> = if("<<FIELD>>"="Predicted actual",'Predicted actual',tostring(round(('<<FIELD>>'/Total *100),2))) ] | fields - Total
